scripts.emulate: cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../../ && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && kill-port 9099 5001 8080 9000 5000 9199 && firebase emulators:start
scripts.bemulate: yarn run build && cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../../ && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && kill-port 9099 5001 8080 9000 5000 9199 && firebase emulators:start
scripts.deploy: cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../../ && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase deploy & firebase deploy
scripts.bdeploy: yarn run build && cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../../ && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase deploy & firebase deploy
scripts.btdeploy: yarn run build && cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../../ && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase hosting:channel:deploy testing & firebase hosting:channel:deploy testing
